Dear Ms. Rivoire,

Warm greeting from Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR

Thank you for forwarding the reservations made by Ambassador Patrick Maisonnave and for your confidence in our services.
I am pleased to attach the special corporate rate agreement for the French Embassy, effective as of today and valid through May 2026.

Please review the agreement and return signed copy at your earliest convenience or maximum by 22 October 2025 to validate the rates.

We look forward to welcoming Ambassador Maisonnave and his team under these preferential terms.

And to further supporting your representational needs. Please do not hesitate to contact me for any reservations, additional requests, or clarifications.

Thank you & Best Regards

1,840.50

1,940.50

2,240.50

*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.

Check in and check out:

*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation.

Method of payment:

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

Dear Aysha,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort.

Regarding your email below, please find our group offer as follows:

Dates : 2 Feb – 4 Feb. 

 

Room Category 

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL /Twin HB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

1,807.50 SAR

2,057.50 SAR

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe) 

2,207.50 SAR

2,457.50 SAR

Skyline Executive Room (Executive) 

2,407.50 SAR

2,657.50 SAR

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Rates calculated on Half-Board basis.
*	Any extra rooms will be subjcet to the hotel availability upon request.
*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

 

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Children Policy:

*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.

Dear Aysha,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort.

Regarding your email below, please find our group offer as follows:

Dates : 2 Feb – 4 Feb. 

 

Room Category 

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL /Twin HB

2,057.50 SAR

2,407.50 SAR

2,657.50 SAR

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Rates calculated on Half-Board basis.
*	Any extra rooms will be subjcet to the hotel availability upon request.
*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

 

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Children Policy:

*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.
*	12 years old and above, will be considered as an adult. 

 

Family Plan:

*	1 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) SGL Room Rate
*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement 
*	2 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) DBL Room Rate
*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by July 20th , 2025, to validate the rates. 

 

Booking should be sent to:

Email      HB6T0-re@accor.com <mailto:HB6T0-re@accor.com>

Dear Mr. Saleh,

 

Greetings from Adam Arabia.

 

Regarding our booking #3635 for 02nd – 04th February 2026, we would like to update you about group status. The visa process for some group members was quite challenging, which caused a delay in informing you. Some members are Colombian, and since there is no Saudi embassy in their country, obtaining visas was more difficult.

 

At this time, 7 rooms have been confirmed, and the rest of the group is still working on their visas.

 

We would like to proceed with 50% payment for 10 rooms only, which we can transfer immediately. Please update the proforma invoice to reflect 10 rooms.

 

Additionally, we hope to sell more than 10 rooms, so kindly let us know if you can tentatively hold 15 rooms for the group till 20th December 2025.

 

Thank you for your understanding, and we look forward to your confirmation.

 

Best regards,

Dear Aysha,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort.

Regarding your email below, please find our group offer as follows:

Dates : 2 Feb – 4 Feb. 

 

Room Category 

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL /Twin HB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

1,807.50 SAR

2,057.50 SAR

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe) 

2,207.50 SAR

2,457.50 SAR

Skyline Executive Room (Executive) 

2,407.50 SAR

2,657.50 SAR

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Rates calculated on Half-Board basis.
*	Any extra rooms will be subjcet to the hotel availability upon request.
*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

 

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Children Policy:

*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.
*	12 years old and above, will be considered as an adult. 

 

Family Plan:

*	1 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) SGL Room Rate
*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement 
*	2 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) DBL Room Rate
*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by July 20th , 2025, to validate the rates. 

 

Booking should be sent to: 

 

Tel          +966 9200 01832

Email      HB6T0-re@accor.com <mailto:HB6T0-re@accor.com> 

Method of payment: 

*	50% of the payment by 1st of September 2025. 
*	Full payment by 31st of December 2025 before the check in of each reservation.

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla - Rate Offer RE: New Booking Request Favor Chinese Group
Body:
Dear Mr. Wael,

The pleasure is mine! It’s wonderful to reconnect with you.

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 02 – 04 December 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

09

1,650.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 02 of November 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

Subject: RE: Meetings & Events Partnership Inquiry - Glomacs Training & Consultancy
Body:
Dear Ms. Chrislene,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort AlUla!

Thank you for considering Shaden Resort for your upcoming training program. 

We’re delighted to extend our corporate offer for Glomacs Training and Consultancy as follows:

Event Dates: 27 – 31 October 2025
Accommodation:

*	5 Single Canyon Deluxe Rooms at SAR 1,480 ++ taxes per room per night, including breakfast

Meeting Arrangements:

*	3 Coffee Breaks at SAR 250 + VAT per person per day
*	Meeting Room Rental: SAR 1,000 + VAT per day

Our meeting venues are fully equipped with modern audiovisual facilities, and our dedicated events team will be delighted to ensure a seamless and productive experience for your participants.

The above offer is valid for 48hrs to secure the availability and prepare detailed agreement for final approval.

Your acceptance at your earliest convenience will be highly appreciated.

We truly look forward to welcoming Mr. Renjith Nair and the Glomacs team to AlUla and to building a long-term partnership for your future training sessions.

Should you require any further information, please contact me anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

 +966 920001832

Subject: RE: Meetings & Events Partnership Inquiry - Glomacs Training & Consultancy

 

Dear Abdullah,

 

Good day to you!

 

Currently we have an upcoming training event planned in AlUla from the 27th of Oct till the 31st of Oct 2025. Usually our courses are from Monday-Friday each week. Hence you can expect more event requests from us after the first one is completed. You can expect a minimum of 5 participants in each course and an instructor who will be conducting the session, representing Glomacs. 

 

We would require 3-full coffee breaks along with lunch for all participants including the instructor and a fully equipped meeting room. 

 

Accommodation options are also required for the mentioned dates of the event.

 

Mr. Renjith Nair is leading the events/ training sessions, and everything will be planned by him. Please coordinate with him about the corporate deal. @Admin - Glomacs <mailto:admin@glomacs.com>  @Meeting Planner - Glomacs <mailto:meetingplanner@glomacs.com>  

 

Thank you & Best regards,

Chrislene Cooray

Travel Coordinator – Middle East Travel Desk

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla : RE: Checking availability of rooms
Body:
Dear Majid,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 03 – 04 December 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

18

1,852.00

Canyon Deluxe Room (Deluxe) 

07

2,232.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 2nd of November 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla : RE: Checking availability of rooms
Body:
Dear Majid,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 03 – 04 December 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

18

1,852.00

Canyon Deluxe Room (Deluxe) 

02

2,232.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 2nd of November 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

Dear Mr. Saleh,

 

Greetings from Adam Arabia.

 

Regarding our booking #3635 for 02nd – 04th February 2026, we would like to update you about group status. The visa process for some group members was quite challenging, which caused a delay in informing you. Some members are Colombian, and since there is no Saudi embassy in their country, obtaining visas was more difficult.

 

At this time, 7 rooms have been confirmed, and the rest of the group is still working on their visas.

 

We would like to proceed with 50% payment for 10 rooms only, which we can transfer immediately. Please update the proforma invoice to reflect 10 rooms.

 

Additionally, we hope to sell more than 10 rooms, so kindly let us know if you can tentatively hold 15 rooms for the group till 20th December 2025.

 

Thank you for your understanding, and we look forward to your confirmation.

 

Best regards,

 

Aysha Samir | Adam Arabia

General Termes & conditions:

*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.

Children Policy:

*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.

*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

Subject: Shaden Resort Al-Ula - Rate Offer RE: 27-29 Nov
Body:
Dear Friend,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 27 – 29 November 2025

 

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Room Rate DBL BB

 

Desert Horizon room (Superior) 

    08

1,755.00

1,855.00

 

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 27th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

Body:
Dear Mr. Ahmed, 

 

Good evening, please find the below email from The Activators ( Kiri ) to deduct 400 SAR from their remaining balance of the last cancelled reservation.

 

And how we can transfer the amount to the photographer who took the pictures for the special breakfast in our property.

 

The photographer is from our side and we informed them about the cost will be 400 SAR for this session. And they want us to deduct it from the remaining balance as per the below email and pay to the photographer.

 

Please advise the best way to proceed the payment to the photographer at your earliest convenience.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me anytime.

 

Thank you & Best Regards

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla - Special Rate Offer RE: Request: Rate and Availability
Body:
Dear Afnan, 
Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!
Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.
Please find the special rates offer as follows:
 
Date : 02 – 04 December 2025	
Room Category 	#Of Rooms	Room Rate SGL BB	Room Rate DBL BB	
Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 	09	1,755.00	1,855.00	
 
General Termes & conditions:
*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.
Check in and check out:
*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

Extra Bed Policy:
*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

Reservations/Rooming list:
*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

Acceptance Date:
*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

Method of payment: 
*	Full payment by 02 of November 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

Cancellation Policy:
*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.
Thank you & Best Regards

 	Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager
  +966 559990187
  +966 920001832

Cc: HISHMA Ahmed <Ahmed.HISHMA@accor.com>
Subject: Farewell and Thank You

 

Dear Colleagues and Friends,
Greetings!

As many of you already know, I will be leaving this beautiful and memorable Shaden Resort, with my last working day on 19th October 2025. You may not see me over the next two days, as I will be clearing my pending leave days, but I will visit all of you on Monday, 20th October one last time before I travel.

Working with you has been more than just a job, it has been a journey filled with shared ambitions, overcoming challenges, and genuine moments of connection. I am deeply grateful for the memories we’ve created together. The support, collaboration, and friendships I’ve experienced with each of you have been both a privilege and a highlight of my career. You’ve made my time here truly meaningful, turning colleagues into friends and work into something I looked forward to each day.

It hasn’t always been an easy path, as some of you may know, but we carried the responsibility together over the past two years, and your support helped me through. As I often say, we learn every day. Each new place and experience adds to our growth, and that’s the true beauty of our hospitality journey.

I will genuinely miss our daily collaborations and the unique warmth of this team. Thank you for motivating me, believing in me, and making each day memorable. I’m proud of what we’ve achieved together. Despite the challenges, we truly made it count.

I wish you all continued success, growth, and the recognition you deserve. Thank you once again for making this experience unforgettable.

Let’s definitely stay in touch!

 

 

Thank you and Hospitality Regards 

 



Yeshwant Naik
Director of Operations

 +966 920001832

Dear Partners,

We would like to extend our heartfelt thanks to each of you for participating in our recent roadshow and for helping make it such a success.

Lucrezia

Body:
Dear Hussain,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 27 – 29 November 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Desert Horizon room Twin Beds (Superior) 

    09

1,755.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 27th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

Dear Janet,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Regarding your below email, please find the answers highlighted in your below email.

The special rates offer for your upcoming group stay as follows:

 

Date : 09 – 11 November 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL HB

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe) 

11

2,207.50

2,457.50

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 23, 2025, to validate the rates secure the availability. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 26th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 16 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

Subject: RE: AlUla Trip Room Reservation Shadan Resort- 6 Nov 2025 Two Nights Stay
Body:
Dear Mr. Amr,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer for your upcoming group accommodation on November 2025 as follows:

 

Date : 06 – 08 November 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Room Rate DBL BB

Desert Horizon Rooms (Superior) 

12

1,755.00

1,855.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.
*	Lunch Supplement : 200 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 12th, 2025, to validate the rates and secure the availability. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 15th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 15 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager
 +966 559990187
 +966 920001832
 www.shadenresort.sa <http://www.shadenresort.sa/> 
43528 Hail Road - AlUla - KSA 
 <https://www.linkedin.com/company/shaden-resort/>   <https://twitter.com/ShadenResort?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor>   <https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSds6FG8r/>   <https://www.instagram.com/shadenresort/>

	Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla - Group Rate Offer RE: Group Booking Request - January 2026

	 

	Dear Mr. Alhussain,

	Warm greetings from Shaden Resort AlUla – Managed by Accor.

	We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in our property.

	Regarding your email below, please find our group offer as follows:

	 

Dates: 22 Jan – 25 Jan , Or , 29 Jan 31 Jan, 2025

Room Category 

Room Rate SGL BB

Room Rate DBL /Twin BB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

1,657.50

1,757.50

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe) 

2,057.50

2,157.50

	 

	Availability: 

	 

	22 to 25 January:

	*	Superior King:                    25
	*	Superior Twin:                   15
	*	Deluxe King:                       06
	*	Deluxe Twin:                      15

	29 to 31 January:

	*	Superior King:                    21
	*	Superior Twin:                   13
	*	Deluxe King:                       06
	*	Deluxe Twin:                      15

	 

	General Termes & conditions:

	*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
	*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
	*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
	*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
	*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

	 

	Check in and check out:

	*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
	*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
	*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
	*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

	 

	Extra Bed Policy:

	*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
	*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

	 

	Children Policy:

	*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
	*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.
	*	12 years old and above, will be considered as an adult. 

	 

	Family Plan:

	*	1 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) SGL Room Rate
	*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement 
	*	2 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) DBL Room Rate
	*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

	 

	Reservations/Rooming list:

	*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

	 

	Acceptance Date:

	*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by August 31, 2025, to validate the rates and prepare detailed group agreement for final approval. 

	 

	Booking should be sent to: 

	 

	Tel          +966 9200 01832

	Email      HB6T0-re@accor.com <mailto:HB6T0-re@accor.com>

	*	50% payment by 15th of September 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 
	*	Full payment by 1st of December 2025 before the check in of each reservation

	 

	Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me anytime.

	Thank you & Best Regards

	It is always a pleasure to welcome you and your guests to Shaden. We sincerely regret the inconvenience you experienced with your last group, and we are committed to ensuring that this time your guests stay will be an excellent experience.

	 

	I am looping in our new Sales Manager, Mr. Abdullah, based in Jeddah, along with our Director of Sales and Marketing, Ms. Hanan, based in Egypt. I am confident they will handle your request with the utmost care and attention.

	Warm greetings from Shaden Resort AlUla – Managed by Accor.

	We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in our property.

	Regarding your email below, please find our group offer as follows:

1,757.50

	*	Deluxe King:                       06
	*	Deluxe Twin:                      15

	29 to 31 January:

	*	Deluxe King:                       06
	*	Deluxe Twin:                      15

	 

	General Termes & conditions:

	*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
	*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
	*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
	*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
	*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

	 

	Check in and check out:

	*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
	*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
	*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
	*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

	 

	Extra Bed Policy:

	*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
	*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

	 

	Children Policy:

	*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
	*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.
	*	12 years old and above, will be considered as an adult. 

	 

	Family Plan:

	*	1 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) SGL Room Rate
	*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement 
	*	2 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) DBL Room Rate
	*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

	 

	Reservations/Rooming list:

	*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

	 

	Acceptance Date:

	*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by August 31, 2025, to validate the rates and prepare detailed group agreement for final approval.

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla - Rate Offer RE: Group Booking Inquiry for December 2025 – Meeting Room Request (Shadeen, AlUla)
Body:
Dear Riham,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 16 – 18 December 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL BB

Desert Horizon room king bed (Superior) 

01

1,755.00

Desert Horizon room Twin beds (Superior)

13

1,755.00

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe) 

03

2,155.00

Skyline Executive room King Bed 

05

2,355.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Meeting Room Packages Rates Per Person Per Day:

 

Meeting Package

Meeting room rent

SAR 2000.00 + 15% VAT Per day

Lunch + Coffee Break

SAR 300.00 + 15 % VAT Per person per day

 

 

 

 

Meeting Rooms Pictures : Google Drive - Meeting Rooms <https://ddec1-0-en-ctp.trendmicro.com/wis/clicktime/v1/query?url=https%3a%2f%2fdrive.google.com%2fdrive%2ffolders%2f194LE49SpbvaCwyG%2dDBZqoFIYAKkkuZTb%3fusp%3ddrive%5flink&umid=dcc6d6ba-fc59-4036-8907-c85c7664d3eb&rct=1758723544&auth=425f1f34671f589a3c09af172bfc11942b97c2dc-1d6e10fa3d5603304d38ad40ff2184b1507773ea> 

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 22, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 29th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

1080

1160

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking ( 01 Room).  
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).        
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Lunch Supplement 200 SAR per person per night
*	Dinner Supplement 250 SAR per person per night.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by September 18th, 2025, to validate the rates and secure the availability.

 

Method of payment:

*	Full payment by 24th of September 2025 before the check in of each reservation.

1080

*	This rate is valid for below booking ( 01 Room).

*	Lunch Supplement 200 SAR per person per night
*	Dinner Supplement 250 SAR per person per night.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.

Subject: FW: [External] Shaden Resort AlUla - Special Rate Offer RE: AlUla room reservation visitor //// 30sep  - 02Oct,2025
Body:
Dear Finance Team,

 

Kindly see the below email from the US Consulate and your assistance is appreciated on this matter.

Due to an error, Mr. David paid for both his and Ms. Mora’s room charges using his credit card. 

The consulate has requested that we refund the amount related to Ms. Mora’s stay back to Mr. David’s card, and then process the correct charge on Ms. Mora’s credit card instead.

Each reservation should be billed individually under the respective guest’s name.

Please confirm if we can proceed with this adjustment. Once confirmed, I will share both credit card details and the required bank account information.

Thank you & Best Regards

 

 

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

 +966 920001832

Subject: [External] Shaden Resort AlUla - Special Rate Offer RE: AlUla room reservation visitor //// 30sep - 02Oct,2025

 

Dear Mr. Suhail,

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

As discussed, Please find the special rates offer as follows:

 

Date : 30 September – 2 October 2025

Room Category 

Room Rate SGL BB

Room Rate DBL BB

Desert Horizon Room (Superior) 

1080

1160

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking ( 01 Room).   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Lunch Supplement 200 SAR per person per night
*	Dinner Supplement 250 SAR per person per night.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by September 18th, 2025, to validate the rates and secure the availability. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 24th of September 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to reach out anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer for your upcoming event on December 2025 Accommodation & Meetings Package as follows:

3

2,155.00

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Dinner Supplement : 250 SAR per person.
*	 

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Meeting Room Packages Rates Per Person Per Day:

 

Meeting Package

Meeting room rent

SAR 1800.00 + 15% VAT Per day

Lunch + 2 Coffee Break

SAR 350.00 + 15 % VAT Per person per day

Acceptance Date:

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 26th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 30 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Dear Ms. Hanan, 

Regarding your email below for the request from Extramile, please note that I have already discussed availability with the client for the requested period. 

Here is the breakdown of what we can currently offer:

*	1 Charles Royal Suite accommodates 5 adults 
*	3 Palm Garden Villas each for 2 adults, total = 6
*	3 Oasis Pool Villas each for 2 adults, total = 6
*	4 Skyline Executive Rooms

This gives us a total of 21 guests.

However, the client has declined this arrangement. They insist that by policy, they require accommodation for 21 guests, and want each villa or unit to host just one guest (only single occupancy in villas)

I explained to them that our villas are two-bedroom units, and Charles Royal Suite is 5 bedrooms. Despite that, the client remained in their policy of single occupancy.

The client has now extended the deadline for their offer to Sunday, giving us until then to see if any cancellations during the requested period, which might allow us to meet their requirements. 

If not, no need to send the proposal.

If you need any further background or want to discuss alternate solutions, please feel free to contact me anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

Subject: RE: New request - 09-10 December 2025 - LT meeting in ALUla - NX2943
Body:
Dear Ms. Hanan, 

Regarding your email below for the request from Extramile, please note that I have already discussed availability with the client for the requested period. 

Here is the breakdown of what we can currently offer:

*	1 Charles Royal Suite accommodates 5 adults 
*	3 Palm Garden Villas each for 2 adults, total = 6
*	3 Oasis Pool Villas each for 2 adults, total = 6
*	4 Skyline Executive Rooms

This gives us a total of 21 guests.

However, the client has declined this arrangement. They insist that by policy, they require accommodation for 21 guests, and want each villa or unit to host just one guest (only single occupancy in villas)

I explained to them that our villas are two-bedroom units, and Charles Royal Suite is 5 bedrooms. Despite that, the client remained in their policy of single occupancy.

The client has now extended the deadline for their offer to Sunday, giving us until then to see if any cancellations during the requested period, which might allow us to meet their requirements. 

If not, no need to send the proposal.

If you need any further background or want to discuss alternate solutions, please feel free to contact me anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

 +966 920001832

Subject: RE: Shaden Resort AlUla - Meeting Rate Offer RE: Al Ula financial offer
Body:
Dear Mr. Riyadh,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort Al-Ula!

Thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla Managed by ACCOR.

Please find the special rates offer for your upcoming group on November 2025 as follows:

 

Date : 02 – 06 November 2025

Room Category 

#Of Rooms

Room Rate SGL FB

Desert Horizon room (Superior) 

 

25

1,927.50

Canyon Deluxe room (Deluxe)

2,327.50

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 400 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 16th, 2025, to validate the rates and share detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 21th of October 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Cancellation Policy:

*	Cancellation of group guaranteed bookings made on 20 days of arrival will be charged Full stay No-Show fee.

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me by email or call anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager

 +966 920001832

Subject: Shaden Resort AlUla RE: عرض سعر
Body:
Dear Mr. Yasser,

Warm greetings from Shaden Resort AlUla!

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your interest in Shaden Resort AlUla – Managed by Accor.

Regarding your email below, please find the special rate offer for your upcoming group as follows:

 

From 5 - 8 February 2026

Room Category

Rooms

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL HB

Desert Horizon Room, 1 King Size Bed

5

1,905.00

2,155.00

Desert Horizon Room,  2 Twin Beds

15

 

From 12 - 15 February 2026

Room Category

Rooms

Room Rate SGL HB

Room Rate DBL HB

Desert Horizon Room, 1 King Size Bed

5

1,905.00

2,155.00

Desert Horizon Room,  2 Twin Beds

15

 

General Termes & conditions:

*	This rate is valid for below booking.   
*	Rates are quoted & payable in Saudi Riyal (SAR).         
*	Rates are per room, per night, exclusive of VAT 15% + 05% Municipality Charges, net non-commissionable.
*	Room Only: Not Applicable.
*	Rates cannot be sold naked on the website, i.e. a room only or bed & breakfast package, and MUST be sold as part of a package, unless with prior written consent

 

Check in and check out:

*	Check-In time at 3.00 p.m. and Check-Out time is to be completed by 12.00 noon.
*	In the event of early departure, the hotel reserves the right to charge the guest up to 100% of the room charge.
*	Late check-out after 12:00 noon (but before 4.00 pm) on the day of departure will result in additional 50% of the room rate.
*	Late Check-out (after 4.00 pm on the same day of departure will result in 100% of the room rate

 

Extra Bed Policy:

*	01 extra-bed is permitted in all room types.
*	Supplement: SAR 300 per night, sharing their parent’s meal plan.

 

Children Policy:

*	Children sharing their parent's rooms (max. 01 child up to 11.99 years) enjoy free accommodation on booked meal plan.
*	Maximum 02 Children under 06 years sharing room and meals with Parents without Extra bed 50% discount on Meal Supplements.
*	12 years old and above, will be considered as an adult. 

 

Family Plan:

*	1 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) SGL Room Rate
*	1 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05,99) SGL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement 
*	2 ADL + 1 CHD (2-11.99) DBL Room Rate
*	2 ADL + 2 CHD (2-05.99) DBL Room Rate + 50% from the meal supplement

 

Reservations/Rooming list:

*	Room reservations are subject to availability and hotel written Confirmation. 

 

Acceptance Date:

*	We kindly request that you confirm your acceptance by October 16th, 2025, to validate the rates and prepare detailed agreement for final approval. 

 

Method of payment: 

*	Full payment by 31st of December 2025 before the check in of each reservation. 

 

Should you require any further information, please don’t hesitate to contact me anytime.

Thank you & Best Regards

 

 

 



Abdullah Saleh
Sales Manager
 +966 559990187
 +966 920001832
 www.shadenresort.sa <http://www.shadenresort.sa/> 
43528 Hail Road - AlUla - KSA

To: SALEH Abdullah <Abdullah.saleh@accor.com>
Subject: عرض سعر 

 

اسعد الله مساك عبدالله،

ان شاء الله تكونوا بخير.

 

يا طويل العمر عندي مدرسة من الرياض حابين يسووا رحلتين في العلا

 

- الاولى بتاريخ ٥-٨ فبراير

- ⁠الثانية بتاريخ ١٢-١٥ فبراير

 

المطلوب لو تكرمت

- ⁠تسعيرة لعدد ١٥-٢٠ غرفة مزدوجة للطلاب مع الإفطار + وجبة (اما غداء او عشاء)

- ⁠تسعيرة لعدد ٥-٦ غرف فردية للمعلمين مع الإفطار + وجبة (اما غداء او عشاء)

 

ارجوا ارسال العرض في اقرب فرصة لانهم مستعجلين.

 

شاكر و مقدر تعاونكم

 

تحياتي،
